blogData.title: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese
blogData.description:
You make videos in English - how can you translate these videos into
  Filipino and Chinese? We'll show you how to translate video and also how to deploy
  making sure you have amazing search engine optimisation (SEO).
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, captioning English video, captioning Filipino video, captioning Tagalog video, captioning Chinese video, subtitling English video, subtitling Filipino video, subtitling Tagalog video, subtitling Chinese video, hardcode captions, hardcode subtitles, subtite translator, subtitle translation, caption translator, caption translation, chinese to english video translation, tagalog to english video translation, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions
blogData.coverAlt: Translate Your English Video Into Filipino And Chinese

data.richContent:
Business today relies on content creation. How do you expand your market? We show you how to add open captions for accessibility wins, and translate your video content into Tagalog and Chinese to expand your target client base!

Matija Squire is a LinkedIn coach, all round nice person plus a good friend. And she is doing something really cool!

We all know Covid-19 has distrupted all our lives. Some of us are lucky enough to be able to earn an income by working from home online. This is Matija doing something that helps people who now need to make money from home!

nodes.title: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI's journey for the NSW Small Business Innovation & Research (SBIR) program for the feasibility study began!
nodes.coverAlt: Our Journey with SBIR Phase 1: Enhancing Healthcare Accessibility for CALD Communities

nodes.title: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program
nodes.description: VideoTranslatorAI wins NSW SBIR 2022 feasibility study, focusing on AI for healthcare in CALD communities. We are excited to contribute to a more inclusive healthcare in NSW.
nodes.coverAlt: VideoTranslatorAI Wins Feasibility Study for NSW Small Business Innovation & Research Program

nodes.title: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
nodes.description: Bahasa Indonesia, the official language of Indonesia, holds a special place in the hearts of its people. Its evolution and distinctive features make it a language that stands out in the world of linguistics. In this blog post, we'll embark on a journey to explore what makes Bahasa Indonesia so unique.
nodes.coverAlt: Unraveling the Unique, Inclusive Language of Indonesia
